exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: High dose nicotinamide vitamin B3 500 mg per vegan capsule - each capsule contains 500 mg of pure nicotinamide (flush-free niacin). Vitamin B3 is an important nutrient found in foods like liver, chicken, tuna, and avocado. Our supplement delivers all the benefits of vitamin B3 without the 'niacin flush' effect. Our plant-based capsules contain no additives, binders, or synthetic fillers, are gluten-free and non-GMO, and are manufactured to GMP standards. Includes a satisfaction guarantee.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Nicotinamide Vitamin B3 is a strong, high-quality supplement providing 500mg nicotinamide per capsule. As a water-soluble vitamin, B3 must be part of your diet to prevent deficiency. Scientific research suggests vitamin B3 promotes healthy energy metabolism, reduces fatigue, maintains healthy mucous membranes and skin, and can improve mental function. Each bottle contains 180 capsules made in a GMP compliant facility.
ingredientsContent: Vitamin B3 (as nicotinic acid amide), vegetable cellulose
informationContent: Allergen Information: Contains: Gluten Free | Units: 180 count | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule | Age Range Description: Adult | Country of origin: United Kingdom
